definition.name: NXmatch_filter

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: n_values
symbol.doc: How many different match values does the filter specify.

definition.doc: Base class of a filter to select members of a set based on their index, identifier, or value.

field.name: method
field.doc:
Definition of the logic what the filter yields: Whitelist specifies which entries with said value to include. Entries with all other values will be excluded.
Blacklist specifies which entries with said value to exclude. Entries with all other values will be included.

field.name: match
field.doc: Array of values to filter according to method. If the match e.g. specifies [1, 5, 6] and method is set to whitelist, only entries with values matching 1, 5 or 6 will be processed. All other entries will be excluded.
